snippet: A 26-year-old and a 27-year-old were killed after the West Indian American Day Parade in Brooklyn, which has been marred by several fatal shootings over the past nine years.
abstract: Two men are fatally stabbed and at least two people wounded in gun violence at the West Indian American Day Parade in Brooklyn, which has been marred by several fatal shootings over the past nine years.

byline.original: By LIZ ROBBINS and RANDY LEONARD

lead_paragraph: A 26-year-old and a 27-year-old were killed after the West Indian American Day Parade in Brooklyn, which has been marred by several fatal shootings over the past nine years.

headline.seo: Two Men Fatally Stabbed As Violence Again Follows West Indian Day Parade
headline.main: Two Are Fatally Stabbed and Two Are Shot as Violence Follows Parade
headline.print_headline: 2 Are Fatally Stabbed After Parade Where the Police Are as Visible as the Revelers
